item.title: Gold demand puts Peru's Amazon at greater risk from mercury poisoning, bishop warns
item.description: A Catholic bishop in Peru’s Amazon is warning that mercury from illegal gold mining is contaminating rivers, fish and people across the region

item.title: Gold futures rise above $4,000 per ounce for the first time
item.description: Gold futures rose above $4,000 per ounce for the first time on Tuesday, as many investors seek a “safe haven” for to park their money as the U.S. gove...

item.title: Slovak leader announces a deal with US on a new nuclear reactor
item.description: Slovakia’s Prime Minister Robert Fico says his government has approved an agreement with the United States to build a new nuclear reactor

item.title: Interest in women’s sports is growing. Here’s how some women-owned companies are responding
item.description: Laura Youngson has made a significant impact by addressing inequality in sports for women and girls

item.title: Global markets mostly advance, with Japan's market inching to another record
item.description: Global shares are mostly higher and Japan’s benchmark has inched up just a few points to a new record
